title: Primitive - Vesting Period Type
description: Abstract type describing the fields common to all periods of time (e.g. 3 months, 365 days) for use in Vesting Terms

length.description: The quantity of `type` units of time; e.g. for 3 months, this would be `3`; for 30 days, this would be `30`

type.description: The unit of time for the period, e.g. `MONTHS` or `DAYS`

occurrences.description: The number of times this vesting period triggers. If vesting occurs monthly for 36 months, for example, this would be `36`
